Package gameClient

Class Ex2

java.lang.Object
gameClient.Ex2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Ex2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class implements Runnable interface that can be run as a thread. It is the main class that includes the main function that starts the game and the following functions: 0. run 1. moveAgents 2. calcDiffLocation 3. nextNode 4. insertAgents 5. bestNextEdge 6. getClosestPokemon 7. jsonToGraph 8. initGame

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  Ex2.GraphJsonDeserializer
    This private class implements JsonDeserializer interface for DWGraph_DS, This is needed for the GsonBuilder to be able to deserialize the graph.
    private static class  Ex2.ValueComparator
    This private class implements Comparator interface and compare values that are stored in the pokemons to sort the pokemon list by the pokemon values, so that the highest value of a pokemon will be the first one at the list.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private static edge_data bestNextEdge​(java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> pokemons, CL_Agent currAgent, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
    This method returns the best next edge in the graph.
    private static double calcDiffLocation​(node_data srcNode, node_data destNode, geo_location fromLocation, geo_location toLocation, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
    This method calculate the distance from the current position of the agent to the target location.
    private static CL_Pokemon getClosestPokemon​(java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> pokemons, CL_Agent currAgent, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
    This method gets the closest pokemon to the current agent by using the shortestPathDist algorithm to find the closest pokemon.
    private static void initGame​(game_service game)
    This method initializes the game, it retrieves the pokemons and the game graph from the JSON file, then updates the graph, the pokemons and the agents to the game.
    private static void insertAgents​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
    This method inserts agents from the JSON into the graph.
    static directed_weighted_graph jsonToGraph​(java.lang.String jsonString)
    This method loads the JSON string and builds a directed weighted graph
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    The main function starts the game by receiving in command line the following two arguments.
    static void moveAgents​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
    This method move the agents in the graph of the game to capture the pokemons.
    private static node_data nextNode​(directed_weighted_graph graph, int src, int dest)
    This method gets the next node provided by the shortest path algorithm.
    void run()
    This method overrides the run method of Runnable, it is activated when the thread starts.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ex2

      public Ex2()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main function starts the game by receiving in command line the following two arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - - the login ID, and the scenario level

    • run

      public void run()
      This method overrides the run method of Runnable, it is activated when the thread starts. It starts the game by loading the graph from the relevant JSON file according to the scenario chosen. It uses the login ID to login to the game. Then manages the game by activating relevant functions.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • moveAgents

      public static void moveAgents​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
      This method move the agents in the graph of the game to capture the pokemons. It moves the agents in an optimized way, by calculating how long to wait between each move.
      Parameters:
      game - - the game service
      gameGraph - - the directed weighted graph of the game

    • calcDiffLocation

      private static double calcDiffLocation​(node_data srcNode, node_data destNode, geo_location fromLocation, geo_location toLocation, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
      This method calculate the distance from the current position of the agent to the target location. It returns the ratio of this distance multiplied by the weight of the current edge.
      Parameters:
      srcNode - - the start node
      destNode - - the end node
      fromLocation - - the start location
      toLocation - - the end location
      gameGraph - - the directed weighted graph of the game
      Returns:
      double - the ratio of the calculated distance multiplied by the weight of the current edge

    • nextNode

      private static node_data nextNode​(directed_weighted_graph graph, int src, int dest)
      This method gets the next node provided by the shortest path algorithm. it uses the src dest that this method received and gets the next node (the index 1) in the list of the shortest path. If the list of the shortest path size is equal to 1, then it gets the first node in the list.
      Parameters:
      graph - - the directed weighted graph of the game
      src - - the start node
      dest - - the dest node
      Returns:
      node_data - the next node in the list that provides the shortest path

    • insertAgents

      private static void insertAgents​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
      This method inserts agents from the JSON into the graph.
      Parameters:
      game - - the game service
      gameGraph - - the directed weighted graph of the game

    • bestNextEdge

      private static edge_data bestNextEdge​(java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> pokemons, CL_Agent currAgent, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
      This method returns the best next edge in the graph. It uses getClosestPokemon function to get the pokemon that is the closest to the current agent. It puts in a HashMap the ID of the current agent and the pokemon that the current agent goes to.
      Parameters:
      pokemons - - the list of pokemons
      currAgent - - the current agent
      gameGraph - - the directed weighted graph of the game
      Returns:
      edge_data the best next edge

    • getClosestPokemon

      private static CL_Pokemon getClosestPokemon​(java.util.List<CL_Pokemon> pokemons, CL_Agent currAgent, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
      This method gets the closest pokemon to the current agent by using the shortestPathDist algorithm to find the closest pokemon.
      Parameters:
      pokemons - - the list of pokemons
      currAgent - - the current agent
      gameGraph - - the directed weighted graph of the game
      Returns:
      CL_Pokemon - the closest pokemon to the current agent

    • jsonToGraph

      public static directed_weighted_graph jsonToGraph​(java.lang.String jsonString)
      This method loads the JSON string and builds a directed weighted graph
      Parameters:
      jsonString - - the JSON string
      Returns:
      directed weighted graph - returns the directed_weighted_graph that was built.

    • initGame

      private static void initGame​(game_service game)
      This method initializes the game, it retrieves the pokemons and the game graph from the JSON file, then updates the graph, the pokemons and the agents to the game.
      Parameters:
      game - - the game service
